speeds.description: Information about motion speed in the different states.

sprint_stamina_decay_duration.description: The duration it takes for stamina to decay all the way to 0 when sprinting

jog_stamina_decay_duration.description: The duration it takes for stamina to decay all the way to 0 when jogging

stamina_recover_time_stand.description: The duration until stamina is fully recovered while in stand

stamina_recover_time_crouch.description: The duration until stamina is fully recovered while in crouch

stamina_recover_time_prone.description: The duration until stamina is fully recovered while in prone

stamina_recover_delay.description: The duration until stamina starts recovering

hipfire_time.description: The time that the avatar remains in hipfire.

throw_hipfire_time.description: The time that the avatar remains in hipfire after throws.

crouch_turn_speed_multiplier.description: The turn speed multiplier used when crouching

prone_turn_speed_multiplier.description: The turn speed multiplier used when prone

jog_turn_speed_multiplier.description: The turn speed multiplier used when jogging

sprint_turn_speed_multiplier.description: The turn speed multiplier used when sprinting

downed_turn_speed_multiplier.description: The turn speed multiplier used when downed

swim_turn_speed_multiplier.description: The turn speed multiplier used when swimming

sprint_noise_radius.description: The noise radius when sprinting, enemies within range will be alerted
